text: Alberto Michelotti (15 July 1930 â€“ 18 January 2022) was an Italian football player and referee. He played for A.C. Fidenza 1922 between 1952 until 1953. In his youth career, he played for Parma Calcio 1913 between 1946 until 1947 and again from 1948 until 1949. He was a FIFA referee between 1973 until 1981. Michelotti died on 18 January 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian football referees Category:Footballers from Parma
title: Alberto Michelotti
